info.name: Dark Stylish/Stylus Interface
info.description: This changes the extension pages of Stylish/Stylus to have a dark theme.
info.additionalInfo: Added support for Chrome Stylus extension if anyone's using that instead of Stylish. For some unknown reason, this is considered "not available for Chrome" even though it mainly is for Chrome with only one Firefox URL. Copy-paste the CSS manually if you're using Google Chrome.
